{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3607093,"name":"","username":"mika123","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mika123/{size}/212087_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-29T13:31:03.975Z","cooked":"

Hello guys, we use LL3 at 2025 season.
But when we back to our school and try to test new code about vision
then we see LL flash the LED by itself ,I try to change pipeline,turn off LED in web host,reflash fireware.
but all doesn’t work.
And when we try to fix it another day
LL can’t boot , state light doesn’t flash

We really want to know what going on, we already have two broken LL

I’d follow the limelight recommendations VRM + 5A breaker for this circuit.

I’d reach out to limelight support. They have been responsive when we’ve had issues. They may be able to offer other things to try/check.
